components/custom/its-schema:
<script type="application/ld+json">
    {
        "@context": "http://schema.org",
        "@type": "LocalBusiness",
        "address": {
            "@type": "PostalAddress",
            "addressLocality": "",
            "addressRegion": "",
            "postalCode": "",
            "streetAddress": ""
        },
        "description": "",
        "name": "{{settings.store_name}}",
        "url":"{{urls.home}}",
        "telephone": "{{settings.phone_number}}",
        "image": "{{getImage settings.store_logo.image 'logo_size'}}"
    }
    </script>
    <script type="application/ld+json">
    {
        "@context": "http://schema.org",
        "@type": "WebSite",
        "url": "{{urls.home}}",
        "potentialAction": {
            "@type": "SearchAction",
            "target": "{{urls.home}}search.php?search_query={search_term_string}",
            "query-input": "required name=search_term_string"
        }
    }
    </script>
    <script type="application/ld+json">
    {
        "@context": "http://schema.org",
        "@type": "Organization",
        "url": "{{urls.home}}",
        "logo": "{{getImage settings.store_logo.image 'logo_size'}}"
    }
</script>
{{#if page_type '==' 'blog_post'}}
    <script type="application/ld+json">
        {
            "@context": "https://schema.org",
            "@type": "BlogPosting",
            "mainEntityOfPage": "{{blog.post.url}}",
            {{#if blog.post.thumbnail}}
                "image": "{{getImage blog.post.thumbnail 'theme_settings.blog_size'}}",
                {{else}}
                    "image": "{{getImage settings.store_logo.image 'logo_size'}}",
            {{/if}}
            "headline": "{{blog.post.title}}",
            {{#if blog.post.author}}
                "author": {
                    "@type": "Person",
                    "name": "{{blog.post.author}}"
                },
            {{/if}}
            "publisher": {
                "@type": "Organization",
                "name": "{{settings.store_name}}"
            },
            "datePublished": "{{blog.post.date_published}}",
            "articleBody": "{{blog.post.body}}"
        }
    </script>
{{/if}}
{{#if page_type '==' 'product'}}
<script type="application/ld+json">
{
    "@context": "https://schema.org/",
    "@type": "Product",
    "name": "{{product.title}}",
    "image": [
        "{{getImage product.main_image 'zoom_size'}}"
    ],
    "description": "{{product.description}}",
    "sku": "{{product.sku}}",
    "brand": {
        "@type": "Brand",
        "name": "{{product.brand.name}}"
    },
    "offers": {
        "@type": "Offer",
        "priceCurrency": "{{currency_selector.active_currency_code}}",
        "price": "{{product.price.value}}",
        "availability": "https://schema.org/{{#if product.in_stock}}InStock{{else}}OutOfStock{{/if}}",
        "url": "{{product.url}}"
    }
}
</script>
{{/if}}
